name: ADDITIONAL_EM_CODE
description: This table holds all information related to additional evaluation and management (E/M) codes.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: EM_CODE_ADDL_ID
columns.description: Procedure codes used in addition to the Level of Service (LOS).

columns.name: EM_CODE_MOD_ID
columns.description: Modifiers associated with the additional E/M code. Stored in comma-delimited format with up to four modifiers.

columns.name: EM_CODE_BILPROV_ID
columns.description: The billing provider for the additional Evaluation and Management (E/M) codes.

columns.name: EM_CODE_UNIQUE_NUM
columns.description: Unique number associated with each additional E/M code. The number is only unique within the contact.

columns.name: EM_NO_CHG_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason that a charge was not triggered for an E/M code. This item being populated does not imply any issues with system integrity or system build; it will be set both for legitimate reasons that a charge was not triggered as well as non-legitimate reasons.
entries: Charge Ready to Trigger flag not set
Order Instructions set to not trigger charges
Order class set to not trigger charges
Charge triggering disabled at resulting lab
Charge filtered through discrimination programming point

columns.name: AR_EM_CODE_DX
columns.description: The associated diagnosis information for additional E/M code data generated by an AR interface.
